title: What To Know For This Fall And Winter Virus Season
content:
Vaccination during pregnancy
(Pfizer Abrysvo only) which will provide the infant with protection against severe RSV
Immunization of the newborn or baby
with an RSV protective antibody called nirsevimab.
Each immunization offers important benefits
COVID-19 vaccine
s
and
Flu vaccine
s
:
Cut your risk of hospitalization by about half.
Make most infections less severe, helping you get back on your feet sooner.
COVID-19 vaccines also reduce your chance of suffering the effects of
Long COVID
.
